1- Convert Directly Hex To Binary

	-12A4					-1C35					-100				-115C
1	2	A(10)	4		1	C(12)	3	5		1	0	0		1	1	5	C(12)
0001	0010	1010	0100		0001	1100	0011	0101		0001	0000	0000		0001	0001	0101	1100

*0001001010100100			*0001110000110101			*000100000000			*0001000101011100


2- Convert Directly Binary To Hex

	-0001	0010	1010	0100		0001	1100	0011	0101		0001	0000	0000		0001	0001	0101	1100
	1	2	10>A	4		1	12>C	3	5		1	0	0		1	1	5	12>C
	*12A4					*1C35					*100				*115C
